question: According to the 2019 World Air Quality Report-Region & City PM2.5 Ranking, what is the rank of India in the list of most polluted countries?
explanation: A pollutant of 2.5-micron size is considered most harmful for human health. According to the 2019 World Air Quality Report-Region & City PM2.5 Ranking, India ranks 5th in the list of most polluted countries. The city of Ghaziabad (Uttar Pradesh) ranks first in the world. Delhi ranks first in the list of most polluted capital cities.
